# AWS CloudTrail Terraform Module for Organization Account Example

This module creates an AWS CloudTrail for an organization account. AWS CloudTrail is a service that enables governance, compliance, operational auditing, and risk auditing of your AWS account.

## Usage

To run this example you need to execute:

```
$ terraform init
$ terraform plan
$ terraform apply
```

Note that this example may create resources which cost money. Run terraform destroy when you don't need these resources.
